markdown:
# Procédure Deploy


1. ``` screen -S screen-name ```

2. ```cd /var/www/someone```

3. ```git clone https://github.com/rhino85/cahut.net.git  --branch master --single-branch```

4. things to change :
   * user-cred
   * port
5. commit changes! so they don't get erased on a git pull :
``` 
git add .
git commit -m "changed port and usercred on local master for jonquille" 
```
6. ``` npm install```
7. ```node server.js > file.log```

ctrl a d pour detach screen


## y'a aussi [nginx](nginx) a configurer bien sûr! + [https](https-procedure)
## et mettre à jour la liste des [instances](instances/)
html:
Procédure Deploy

  1. screen -S screen-name

  2. cd /var/www/someone

  3. git clone https://github.com/rhino85/cahut.net.git --branch master --single-branch

  4. things to change :

    • user-cred
    • port

  5. commit changes! so they don't get erased on a git pull :

    git add .
git commit -m "changed port and usercred on local master for jonquille"

  6. npm install

  7. node server.js > file.log

ctrl a d pour detach screen

y'a aussi nginx a configurer bien sûr! + https

et mettre à jour la liste des instances
